description:
For a day in the life. This sleek daypack has all the organization you need for full days at the office or on campus. The main compartment opens with a clever J-shaped zipper, so it's easy to grab your laptop from the side or the top. And there's plenty of room for your lunch and other urban essentials. Subtle styling looks great with denim or your office pants.

  • Durable 100% recycled polyester fabric
  • J-zippers open the main compartment, giving you top and side access
  • NeoSpacer mesh and foam backpanel fits comfortably on urban commutes
  • Quick-release aluminum hook on the harness lets you escape from the bag, if needed
  • Padded sleeve fits documents or a 15-inch laptop
  • Front zippered pocket is lined with scratch-free material
  • Internal zippered security pocket has a key clip
  • Low profile side pocket fits a water bottle
  • Mesh sleeve on the shoulder strap fits a transit pass
name: Osprey Arcane Large 20L Daypack - Unisex
